content: स्वधा [स्वद्-आ पृषो° दस्य धः] {@--1@} One's own nature or determination, spontaneity. {@--2@} One's own will or pleasure. {@--3@} The oblation of food offered to the Pitṛs or Manes of deceased ancestors; स्वधासंग्रहतत्पराः <ls>R. 1. 66</ls>, <ls>Ms. 9. 142</ls>, <ls>Y. 1. 102.</ls> {@--4@} The food offered to the Manes personified. {@--5@} Food or oblation in general. {@--6@} One's own portion or share. {@--7@} A Śrāddha or funeral ceremony. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Māyā or illusion. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} An exclamation uttered on offering an oblation to the Manes (with <ab>dat.</ab>); पितृभ्यः स्वधा <ls>Sk.</ls>
